author: Home Repair Tutor
description: Schluter shower curb tips…I installed this custom curb using 2 inch KERDI-BOARD. I apply mortar to the floor, shower pan and walls. The goal is to make the curb level yet pitched slightly toward the shower so water drains properly. This is one of my favorite ways to build a curbed shower 🔥#schlutersystems #curbedshower #bathroomrenovation #diy #homerepairtutor
title: Schluter Shower Curb Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
